security: Disclosing the existence of a 201 file on Evelio Duque Miyar could compromise intelligence sources or methods related to Cuban operations. Revealing the file number and the request for traces might expose ongoing investigations or intelligence-gathering activities. Quoting directly: "EVELIO DUQUE MIYAR IS SUBJECT OF 201-0302008...DEFER TO HQS FOR TRACES."
summary: A SECRET IPB cable from the STAFF to GUAYAQUIL, with info to DIRECTOR and QUITO, regarding Evelio Duque Miyar, a Cuban subject with a 201 file, requesting HQ to conduct traces.
summary_one_paragraph: On February 28, 1978, a SECRET IPB cable was sent from the STAFF to GUAYAQUIL, with informational copies to the DIRECTOR and QUITO, concerning Evelio Duque Miyar, born January 13, 1927, in Las Villas, Cuba. The cable references file 201-0302008 and directs GUAYAQUIL to defer to Headquarters for any further traces on the subject.
title: Evelio Duque Miyar - Request for Traces
